member.summary: The tree level relative to the specified root account.

member.summary: The date of the account's next autoship run.

member.summary: Returns basic account data for matching accounts in a specified account's downline.
member.param: The specification parameters for searching downline data.

member.summary: Returns extended data related to an account inside another account's downline.

The account ID of the person whose info will be returned.
